== Exercise: Enable handlers and avoiding data loss
=== Enable the save handler only if necessary
Change your `SaveAllHandler` class so that the _save_ handler is only active if there is a part in the model which has its `dirty` attribute set to true.
=== Enable the deletion handler only if necessary
This exercise is optional.
Similar to
enable the deletion handler for todos only if a `Todo` is selected.
=== Avoid data loss in your ExitHandler
Change your `ExitHandler` class so that in the case of a dirty editor the user is prompted if he wants to save the data.
